mapper.select: SELECT U_SQ usrId, U_PW usrPw, U_NM usrNm, PHONE_NO mblPno, U_EMAIL emailAddr, JOIN_DT joinDt FROM USERS WHERE U_EMAIL = #{emailAddr} AND U_PW = #{usrPw}
SELECT A.RL_ID AS rlId, B.RL_CD AS rlCd, B.RL_NAME AS rlName, B.RL_CLS AS rlCls FROM RL_USER_MPPG A INNER JOIN RL_MNG B ON A.RL_ID = B.RL_ID WHERE A.U_SQ = #{usrId}
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM MENU_MNG C, (SELECT B.MENU_ID FROM RL_USER_MPPG A INNER JOIN MENU_RL_MPPG B ON A.RL_ID = B.RL_ID WHERE A.U_SQ = #{usrId}) D WHERE C.MENU_ID = D.MENU_ID AND C.MENU_DIV = 2
